sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Salesforce.com topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 5.0%.
Year to date, Salesforce.com registers a 31.1% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Tiffany, trading down 10.0%.
Tiffany is lower by about 9.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are J.M.
Smucker, trading down 4.3%, and Juniper Networks, trading up 3.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
